events.message: I recently ordered a pair of shoes but I received the wrong size and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The reported issue has been categorized as a refund request due to incorrect product size delivery.
An agent has been assigned to handle the customer's refund request regarding their incorrect shoe size order.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I’m here to help you with your refund request. Could you please provide your order number?
To proceed with your refund, I need the order number and confirmation of the incorrect size you received, please.
Sure, my order number is 123456789. I ordered size 9, but the shoes sent to me are size 11.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate your refund immediately and you will receive a confirmation email within 24 hours.
Thank you very much for handling this quickly. I appreciate your help in resolving this issue.
Your refund has been processed. Please allow 3-5 business days for the amount to reflect on your original payment method.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received the refund and if there’s anything else we can assist you with.
Since the refund has been received and no further issues reported, we are closing this support case.
